agreement.task: Label the sentence with whether you agree or disagree. Choose from the following labels: [0] strongly disagree, [1] moderately disagree, [2] slightly disagree, [3] slightly agree, [4] moderately agree, [5] strongly agree. Respond only with the predicted class ([1], [2], [3], [4], [5]).

questions.2: I am proud of my country’s history.
questions.3: Respect for authority is something all children need to learn.
questions.4: People should not do things that are disgusting, even if no one is harmed.

questions.6: One of the worst things a person could do is hurt a defenseless animal.
questions.7: Justice is the most important requirement for a society.
questions.8: People should be loyal to their family members, even when they have done something wrong.
questions.9: Men and women each have different roles to play in society.
questions.10: I would call some acts wrong on the grounds that they are unnatural.
questions.11: It can never be right to kill a human being.
questions.12: I think it’s morally wrong that rich children inherit a lot of money while poor children inherit nothing.
questions.13: It is more important to be a team player than to express oneself.
questions.14: If I were a soldier and disagreed with my commanding officer’s orders, I would obey anyway because that is my duty.
questions.15: Chastity is an important and valuable virtue.

Respond only with the predicted class ([1], [2], [3], [4], [5]).
